extendedInfo.description: Now the #1 ranked hot potato phrase guessing party game from iPhone is available on Android!If you like Party Word games like Catch Phraseâ¢, Tabooâ¢, Scattergoriesâ¢ or Charades then this is the app for you! Phrase Party! guaranteed to bring even the biggest party poopers come to life and join the fun. â Rated The #3 Application on the App Store by toptentopten.com â Rated one of the top 6 Party Games by techbu.com â "It makes the party entertaining and full of life." -- Techbu.com â "Its a great way to get your friends together and have some fun" -- DayFly.com What is Phrase Party? ----------- Phrase Party is a simple but exciting game where you try to describe a phrase that appears on the screen to your teammates by using words, not gestures. You pass the device around until the timer goes off and the person holding the device loses. Phrase Party! is beautiful, simple to use, super fun and packed with features that other, similar apps can only dream of. What separates Phrase Party! from the competition? ---------- â AWESOME PHRASES: Hand picked phrase database of over 10K words and growing from these categories. Choose one category, mix and match, or pick 'Everything' to use them all. - Sports - Entertainment - Science - Places - Food - World - Sayings â EXPANSION PHRASE PACKS: Play with amazing and hilarious expansion categories that you can buy.- Adult- College- Tha Streetz - Vampire Sagas - Tis the Season - Stars and Stripes â CUSTOMIZATION: Add your own phrases and phrase categories. Share them with your friends. Set your timer length, play with up to 4 teams, set team names and more. â GREAT INTERFACE: A clean, beautiful interface that you will feel right at home using. â NO REPEATS: or spelling errors. I promise. I have recently responded to user feedback and completely redesigned this app to provide a better User Experience in version 2.0. Please keep this in mind as you browse older app reviews.------ Although The rules and game play in Phrase Party!'s classic mode are very similar to that of Catch Phraseâ¢ by Hasbro Inc., Catch Phraseâ¢ is a registered trademark of Hasbro Inc. This product is in no way affiliated or endorsed by Hasbro and should not be confused with their product, Catch Phraseâ¢.

reviews.title: A couple of problems
reviews.comment: The beeping sound only works for about 2 beeps and then gets choppy and stops.  Some of the menus are cut off. I expected more out of an iPhone game on my Nexus 4 phone. It\'s the only pure Google designed phone from the ground up, including pure Android build, so I expect more quality.
reviews.author: Isaac Newsome

reviews.title: Great port of the game, timer a bit buggy.
reviews.comment: The timer tick sound cuts out after one second. Then it comes on intermittent a few times. The end buzzer still goes off at the set time.
reviews.author: Al M

reviews.title: They listen!
reviews.comment: First of all-you have to love a company that listens and replies to reviews :)  Thank you guys for making this game.  A lot of time has been put into this and it\'s easy to tell.  I played this game when I was in the hospital for months -never got bored
reviews.author: Redmond Ramos

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work. Wasted money.
reviews.comment: Even after promises that the issue has been fixed, recent updates have not addressed the problem. Timer settings do not work.
reviews.author: Daniel Egan

reviews.title: Great for small travel parties
reviews.comment: Had fun with this app at a hotel with some friends. Still has bugs to work out and maybe a cleaner, prettier UI, but definitely a fun game.
reviews.author: Tyler Bigler

reviews.title: Child programmer?
reviews.comment: what graphics do exist do not line up and look very shotty - I mean how hard is it to left align buttons in a column. I truly feel like a beginning programmer made this app. I guess you could say the core functionality is there but as far as usability and feeling, this app is horrible. the video talks about multiple game type style plays it doesn\'t exist in this app. the concept is nice but the execution very poor.
reviews.author: Wil Wells

reviews.title: Works but looks ugly
reviews.comment: The functionality is there... but frankly the whole application looks terrible. Custom GUI doesn\'t work very Well.  Also, it pushed a blatant advertisement to my notification bar.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but lacks the cool factor
reviews.comment: This app is fun but the logo and just the whole app look clunky and old. Would be really nice to see an update to make the same fun game look sleek and modern
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fast pocket fun
reviews.comment: Party game to go.  Drinking helps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The whole family agreed it has a lot more words than  the $20 original!
reviews.author: Doyle Unruh

reviews.title: Still receiving ads in my notification bar.
reviews.comment: Like the title, I still receive ads in my notification bar, even though I bought the app. Other than that, it\'s fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game!!
reviews.comment: Love this game!!!! There is an adult pack that u buy separate for .99 cents that is sooo funny.   my friends and i play this game during happy hour
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Love this game!!! Always have fun playin this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Love it!!!  Totally worth $2! Thanks so much for making this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buzzer fixed horay
reviews.comment: Finally working buzzer. Now its one of the best apps on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t save my custom phrases. Error exporting custom phrases.
reviews.author: A Google User
